headline: ecobee Expands SmartBuildings Platform with New Multifamily API, Enhancing Flexibility and Control for Property Operators
summary: Today at the AHR Expo, ecobee announced an expansion to its SmartBuildings platform, offering a new SmartBuildings API for multifamily operators. The update gives property managers increased flexibility in how they manage HVAC performance across their portfolios and how ecobee thermostats integrate with existing Resident Experience Platforms (REPs) and building management systems. With enhanced platform compatibility and more control over HVAC behavior, property teams can optimize runtime, reduc

headline: A Look At Generac Holdings (GNRC) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Generac Holdings (GNRC) has come into focus after its shares closed at US$168.04. Recent returns have been mixed across different timeframes, putting fresh attention on how its business metrics stack up for investors. See our latest analysis for Generac Holdings. At the current share price of US$168.04, Generac has recently seen a 19.1% 1 month share price return and a 19.1% year to date share price return. Its 1 year total shareholder return of 12.5% contrasts with a weaker 5 year total...
